text: Jara he tumacyaca sobata nighalehi asate tara tumacyasathi upadravakherija dusarya konatyahi gostici vadha keli nasati, kimbahuna tumacya daramyana utpata majavinyasathi dhavapala keli asati ani tumacyata phuta padanyaci sandhi sodhata rahile asate, tyanna mananare svatah tumacyata hajara aheta ani sarvasrestha allaha atyacari lokanna cangalya prakare janato
